response.overview: THE HORSEMEN COMETH follows the world’s only P-51 Mustang formation aerobatic team as they harness the grace and power of the legendary “Cadillacs of the Sky.” The film documents the journey of three renowned air show pilots as they attempt to tame these vintage fighters and showcase the plane’s heritage at air shows around the world.  THE HORSEMEN COMETH gives viewers a chance to vicariously experience the heart-pounding ride of risk and reward undertaken by these daring pilots.
response.tagline: The world's only P-51 formation aerobatic team
response.title: The Horsemen Cometh
